test.name: Autenticação de usuário com sucesso

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (139.0.7258.154) detected in PATH at C:\Automação de Testes\Robot Framework\chromedriver-win64\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (140.0.7339.81); currently, chromedriver 140.0.7339.81 is recommended for chrome 140.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//*[@id="flash"]' contains text 'You logged into a secure area!'.
kw.arg: You logged into a secure area!

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.doc: Realizar a autenticação de um usuário com sucesso

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (139.0.7258.154) detected in PATH at C:\Automação de Testes\Robot Framework\chromedriver-win64\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (140.0.7339.81); currently, chromedriver 140.0.7339.81 is recommended for chrome 140.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
